Description:
Detects the execution of WMIC with the "csproduct" which is used to obtain information such as hardware models and vendor information

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Hardware Model Reconnaissance Via Wmic.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (command like '%csproduct%' and (process_path like '%\wmic.exe' and original_file_name = 'wmic.exe'))
